author: ebrondol
body:
This PR is a continuation of the PR #15183 .
The entire `customise_Reco` method as been migrated to era for both tilted and flat geometry.
Mostly of the migration has been done following the Phase1 migration. 
No difference is expected with the baseline, here the comparison for [flat](http://ebrondol.web.cern.ch/ebrondol/Phase2Tracking/MovingToEra/20160810/TTbar_14TeV_flat_withCastor/) and [tilted](http://ebrondol.web.cern.ch/ebrondol/Phase2Tracking/MovingToEra/20160810/TTbar_14TeV_tilted_withCastor/) using the MTV. No difference is also expected for phase0/1 iterative tracking.

Thanks to @makortel for the precious help (again and again!).
Informing @VinInn @rovere @delaere @boudoul @kpedro88
title: Second part of the migration to era for phase2 tracking
